thread.title: Chance the Rapper Remixed Drake's "Grammys" as Ode to His Historic Win
thread.title_full: Chance the Rapper Remixed Drake's "Grammys" as Ode to His Historic Win

author: khal
title: Chance the Rapper Remixed Drake's "Grammys" as Ode to His Historic Win
text: Aside from Rihanna , Chance the Rapper had the best night at the 59th Grammy Awards. After his stellar 2016 release Coloring Book became the first streaming-only album to receive a Grammy nomination , Chance ended up taking home three Grammys: Best New Artist (which makes him the first black hip-hop artist to win this award since Lauryn Hill in 1999 ), Best Rap Performance for Coloring Book 's "No Problem," and the Best Rap Album award for Coloring Book . After that spiritual performance during the show , it made sense that Chance had a lot to celebrate, and during what appears to be a very lit Grammys afterparty, Chance previewed a remix of Drake's Future-featured Views song "Grammys," which you can hear up above courtesy of YesJulz .
